chatBox.hopOnDis: O sube a nuestra Discord para chat de voz 🎤
chatBox.placeholder: Por favor, respeta a los otros.~

intro.justoneIntro0: This is an online game based on
intro.justoneIntro2: , a co-op word game for 3+ players.
intro.justoneIntro3: In each of the 13 rounds, come up with a one-word hint for the guesser...
intro.justoneIntro4: But beware: duplicate hints are discarded!

frontPage.joinUsTime: Para Nuestra noche de juegos cada lunes a las 18 horas, zona de tiempo pacífico de los Estados Unidos.

createPrivateModal.text: También conseguirás otras ventajas, por ejemplo un imagen personalizado.
createPrivateModal.title: Para crear una sala privada, apóyanos!

privateModal.text:
Para entrar, pide el nombre de la sala o el enlace de tus compañeros.  

Para crear una sala privada,
Apóyanos!
privateModal.title: Esta sala es privada. 🔒

linkFooter.buyGame: Comprar el juego de mesa físico.

onewordGame.customPlaceholder: Input your own word list e.g. "sneezy, phylum, europe, sloth, guacamole, data, colossus"...
onewordGame.invitation: Invitar a tus amigos a jugar.
onewordGame.realWordText: Estás seguro que es una palabra real?

showChampionModal.text: Si nos apoyas como campeón, tendrás esta ventaja.
showChampionModal.title: Marcar esta suposición como correcto?

showSupportModal.text: Si nos apoyas, ganarás ventajas como salas privadas, imágenes personalizados, y más
showSupportModal.title: Quieres salas privadas?

showUniquifiedModal.text: {'Un otro "'}{player}{'" era ya en esta sala...'}
showUniquifiedModal.title: {'Ahora eres "'}{player}{'"!'}

onewordGame.similarClueText: Esta pista es demasiada semejante a la palabra.
onewordGame.wrongGuessText: {'Aww, '}{guesser}{' ha adivinado "'}{guessword}{'", pero la palabra era "'}{word}{'"...'}

onewordGameEnd.continuePlaying: No quieres terminar el juego? Bueno. Haz click aquí para continuar.
onewordGameEnd.message0: Entiendes que este juego es un juego cooperativo, no?
onewordGameEnd.message1: Al menos no puedes hacer peor la próxima vez.
onewordGameEnd.message10: Ah! Estoy impresionado. Era un error?
onewordGameEnd.message11: Has conseguido el nivel siguiente. Prueba una categoría más difícil la próxima vez.
onewordGameEnd.message3: Here's a tip: try not colliding so much.
onewordGameEnd.message4: Well, it's not the worst result I've ever seen...
onewordGameEnd.message5: Alright, now that you've warmed up, are you ready to play for real?
onewordGameEnd.message6: Respectable attempt. Want to try again?
onewordGameEnd.message7: Okay... At least it's a lucky number?
onewordGameEnd.message8: Not bad! Now we're getting somewhere.
onewordGameEnd.message9: Pretty good job -- but can you make it to double digits?
onewordGameEnd.textForSellingSupporter: If you enjoyed One Word, consider becoming a supporter!
onewordGameEnd.textForSupporterPrivilege: You can earn nice perks like private rooms, while helping cover our server costs.
onewordGameEnd.textForSupporters: {'Hope you had fun, '}{name}{'! This is all made possible by supporters like you 😍'}
onewordGameEnd.wrapUpText: While you're here, check out two of our new games

changeAvatar.message0: You can change your avatar on

supporter.austinSayingHi: Hi there! I'm Austin, the lead developer behind One Word. If you've been enjoying the game, consider becoming a supporter!
supporter.cancel: You can cancel your support at any time -- and if you're unhappy for any reason, let us know and we'll provide a full refund.
supporter.cantStopHere: Can't stop at just One Word?

champion.description: Become a Champion, and you'll get two new perks. First, you get the ability to override our scoring system and mark ANY guess as correct.
champion.getSupporter: And of course, you'll get all the benefits that Supporters get: private rooms and a custom user avatar!
champion.img0: An example game round, where Amey guessed 'speckled' but the word was 'spot'.
champion.img1: The same game round, but now 'speckled' is marked as correct.
champion.img2: Some different word lists to play with, like Countries and Pokemon.
champion.markCorrect: You can mark it as correct!
champion.name: Champion
champion.speckled: If you think "speckled" was close enough...
champion.tryThese: Tired of nouns, verbs, and adjectives? Try these!
champion.unlockTheme: You'll also unlock a bunch of specially-themed word lists to play with:

supporter.explainCoverFee: You'll be helping cover our server and development costs, and we offer some neat perks as well!
supporter.question: As always, if you have any questions, or need help, get in touch at

sponsor.description: As a Sponsor of One Word, you'll be credited on our home page for EVERYONE to see.
sponsor.getAllPrivilege: And naturally, all the Supporter and Champion perks are yours as well. Private rooms! Correct guesses! Themed word lists! What are you waiting for?
sponsor.img1: Austin's profile picture and username, but it looks so divine that the other names pale in comparison
sponsor.name: Sponsor
sponsor.purple: Purple, the color of royalty, emperors... and you!
sponsor.purpleBorder: Plus, you now get a *purple* border. One-up all the other supporters!

supporter.adFree: Supporters also get priority support and an ad-free experience. Does that all sound good?

description.message0: All supporters get the ability to create private rooms
description.message1: those are rooms which are not visible from the home page, and are invite-only.

supporter.img0: Dropdown menu that Mods see when they are in a room. It has two options, Public and Private, and Private is selected.
supporter.img1: Austin's profile picture and username in the the list of players in a room, but Austin's name looks better than the rest.
supporter.name: Supporter
supporter.noRando: No more randos crashing your family game
supporter.unlockAvatar: You'll also unlock a customizable user avatar with a shiny gold border. Rep your supporter status to all your friends!

testies.emily: "Our team at work loved playing One Word earlier this week in our weekly coffee social over zoom! I had played this game before in real life and I found your virtual version to be even easier to use because the words come up automatically and there's less transition time... You have fans on our team and we can't wait to play again!" -Emily
testies.eric: "I'm a 5th/6th grade Language Arts teacher in Ohio, and have been using the game/your site as a reward for students who get all their virtual assignments done... Thanks for your time and effort on this awesome project." -Eric
testies.fanSays: Here's what our fans have to say:
testies.harrison: "As a totally blind person I've been looking for games that I can play... Last Sunday, I had a play test with Sinclair, and those changes were made incredibly quickly. I played a few rounds this morning, and it was a much more enjoyable experience, and I believe in supporting developers who help their players. Thank you again." -Harrison
testies.name: Testimonials
testies.sandy: "We’ve been doing weekly Zoom game nights with extended family and this will be a great addition. It’s great for our large age range and really nice for older relatives who appreciate that you can play at your own pace." -Sandy

thanks.granted: Your supporter benefits have just been granted!
thanks.heart: Again, from the bottom of my heart:
thanks.meansAlot: It means the world to us, that you enjoyed One Word this much.

somethingWentWrong.message0: (If this takes more than a minute, something broke. Sadface.
somethingWentWrong.message1: Ping austin@oneword.games and I'll get you sorted out.)

thanks.title: Thanks for your support!
